title: Lead
content: The **C5a receptor** also known as **complement component 5a receptor 1** (**C5AR1**) or **CD88** (**C**luster of **D**ifferentiation **88**) is a [G protein-coupled receptor](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/G_protein-coupled_receptor) for [C5a](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Complement_component_5a). It functions as a [complement receptor](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Complement_receptor). C5a receptor 1 modulates inflammatory responses, obesity, development, and cancers. From a signaling transduction perspective, C5a receptor 1 activation is implicated in [β-arrestin2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arrestin_beta_2) recruitment via [Rab5a](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RAB5A), coupling of Gαi proteins, ERK1/2 phosphorylation, calcium mobilization, and Rho activation leading to downstream functions, such as secretion of cytokines, [chemotaxis](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chemotaxis), and phagocytosis.
sentences: The **C5a receptor** also known as **complement component 5a receptor 1** (**C5AR1**) or **CD88** (**C**luster of **D**ifferentiation **88**) is a [G protein-coupled receptor](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/G_protein-coupled_receptor) for [C5a](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Complement_component_5a).
C5a receptor 1 modulates inflammatory responses, obesity, development, and cancers.

From a signaling transduction perspective, C5a receptor 1 activation is implicated in [β-arrestin2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arrestin_beta_2) recruitment via [Rab5a](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RAB5A), coupling of Gαi proteins, ERK1/2 phosphorylation, calcium mobilization, and Rho activation leading to downstream functions, such as secretion of cytokines, [chemotaxis](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chemotaxis), and phagocytosis.

title: Cells
content:
The C5a receptor 1 is expressed on:

- [Granulocytes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Granulocyte)
- [Macrophages](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Macrophage)
- [Monocytes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monocyte)
- [Dendritic cells](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dendritic_cell)
- Hepatoma-derived cell line [HepG2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HepG2)
- [Astrocytes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Astrocyte)
- [Microglia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microglia)

title: Agonist and antagonists
content: Potent and selective [agonist](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Agonist) and [antagonists](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Receptor_antagonist) for C5a receptor 1 have been developed.
sentences: Potent and selective [agonist](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Agonist) and [antagonists](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Receptor_antagonist) for C5a receptor 1 have been developed.
